programme.title: Americas Most Delish
programme.desc: Celebrate some of the Midwest's holiday favorites. Where scotcheroos take center stage, snicker salads delight, and the pink stuff surprises the pallet.

programme.title: KCRA Local News
programme.desc: Get the latest news and weather from KCRA.

programme.title: Easy Money: Fraud, Fortune and Failures
programme.desc: (2021) With nearly 15 hours of interviews from 17 people – and dozens of hours of news footage — Easy Money tells the story of what is being called the worst fraud in California history.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.desc: Decades-old cold cases are finally solved thanks to advances in DNA technology.

programme.title: Maker Nation Challenge
programme.desc: In Orlando, nothing is as it seems. For three special effects artists, it's all on the line as they compete to create an Orlando-inspired theme park character. Little do they know, things are about to get hairy.

programme.title: Sports Town Stories
programme.desc: From a dance instructor who prioritizes mental health for her students, to a high school baseball coach who exemplified courage, KC athletes show off their formulas for success.

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.desc: A look at daring escapes from custody and the breakouts that take on many forms – yet always involve finding and exploiting the weakest parts of the system.

programme.title: The Roller Coaster Wars That Birthed a Beast
programme.desc: In 2006, two dozen roller coaster riders landed in the hospital after a freak malfunction in Ohio. This is the story of Kings Island: how its thrilling – and sometimes nail-biting – history spawned one of America’s greatest amusement parks.

programme.title: Chaos & Kindness
programme.desc: This story will put a smile on your face. The team helps one of their dearest friends get his greatest wish: a brand new smile.

programme.title: KCRA Game On: Fight for the Kings
programme.desc: Game On: Fight for the Kings is a KCRA 3 documentary with never-before-heard stories of the four-month fight, the friendships garnered between the rival cities, and Sacramento doing the unimaginable: winning the battle for the Kings.

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.desc: A fugitive escapes through the ceiling. A man plows his car into the police station. These shocking stories prove cops don't even have to leave the building to encounter the unpredictable.

programme.title: Local Love
programme.desc: Single Samuel is a man on the move looking to find the right woman to settle down with and start a family in Sacramento. He’s in for a treat with a trip to a goat farm, a loop around a rollerskating rink and a very revealing art experience.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.desc: In a serene community, a beloved doctor is bludgeoned in her own home. Investigators uncover a conspiracy that rocks the close-knit neighborhood to its core​​.

programme.title: Boston Rob Does Beantown
programme.desc: Rob proves that this iconic locale is more than just Ivy League. He makes pasta from scratch, crafts a custom knife and tries to make an escape from one of the toughest spots in all of Beantown.

programme.title: Ed & Day in The 'Burgh
programme.desc: Ed & Day get hands on experience baking and cooking as they eat their way through the diverse Strip District ending their day at Cinderlands.

programme.title: Finding Adventure
programme.desc: Camryn Simpson, a 21-year-old student at the University of Pittsburgh and ambassador on social media platforms can’t take time away from her phone. With the help of Kinga, Camryn will log-out of social media and log-in to the outdoors to find adventure.

programme.title: Absolutely Albuquerque
programme.desc: Old classics get a fun twist. Amanda hits the town with expert mixologist Kate Gerwin, who introduces her to a custom sneaker shop, a new pizza place with some unexpected ingredients, and the city’s unique lowrider scene.

programme.title: What's On The Menu?
programme.desc: We eat with our eyes first! Enjoy these Baltimore chefs crafting some of the most beautiful plates in the city, from a perfect mushroom stew, to an elaborate Venezuelan ceviche.

programme.title: Sports Town Stories
programme.desc: From swimmers fueled by loved ones' unconditional support, to basketball and field hockey siblings driving each other toward greatness, see how family and sports are intertwined in the 'Burgh.

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.desc: Crimes exploiting online generosity are a growing trend. These real-life stories show people going to great lengths to con unsuspecting donors out of their money.

programme.title: Refugees Welcome: A Story of Immigration to America’s Heartland
programme.desc: Refugees Welcome documents how one Governor’s brave decision to welcome refugees during the Vietnam War had far reaching repercussions not only for the country but, generations later, for the fate of his own family.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.desc: A true crime series telling the story of unfathomable crimes that have rocked American communities leaving them forever changed.

programme.title: Game Gone Wild: The Socker Slam Story
programme.desc: A stranger than fiction documentary that chronicles a semi-scripted extreme sporting league that premiered in 2000. Socker Slam took elements of wrestling, rugby and “butts up” shenanigans and body slammed them into a soccer drama.

programme.title: Game Gone Wild: The Socker Slam Story
programme.desc: A stranger than fiction documentary that chronicles a semi-scripted extreme sporting league that premiered in 2000. Socker Slam took elements of wrestling, rugby and “butts up” shenanigans and body slammed them into a soccer drama.

programme.title: Easy Money: Fraud, Fortune and Failures

programme.title: 60 Min Documentaries
programme.desc: A playlist of hour long VL Originals

programme.title: Lowrider Legacy
programme.desc: Lowrider Legacy follows celebrated lowrider families, scholars, and activists and documents the history of resistance on wheels that has defined lowrider culture.

programme.title: Local Love
programme.desc: One local single experiences some of the best their city has to offer on three blind dates. Our singles may spend three perfect days out on the town, but there can only be one love match. Who will be picked for a second date?

programme.title: Stitch
programme.desc: Stitch showcases the feel-good and do-good that make up the fabric of America from inspiring tales of perseverance, to good Samaritans helping neighbors, to trailblazers improving their communities.

programme.title: Human Race by Runner's World
programme.desc: 84% of women have been harassed while running. Not Today, by Runner's World, examines this through the stories of three runners. Mollie Tibbetts and Wendy Martinez were both brutally murdered, while Kelly Herron fought off her attacker and survived.

programme.title: Easy Money: Fraud, Fortune and Failures
programme.desc: (2021) With nearly 15 hours of interviews from 17 people – and dozens of hours of news footage — Easy Money tells the story of what is being called the worst fraud in California history.

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.desc: Crimes, Cons & Capers explores some of the wildest headline-grabbing crimes and far-fetched escapades from across the country including bizarre love scams, high-speed car chases, risky prison breaks and more.

programme.title: Restaurants on the Radar
programme.desc: Brendan O'Connor has been tracking down and writing about hidden gem restaurants in Orlando for over a decade. Now you get to come along with him on a foodie tour of The City Beautiful to see what makes these places so special and a must try

programme.title: Eat Play Stay
programme.desc: Experience serious vacation vibes and discover some of the most special corners of America on this guided tour of must-visit cities.

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.desc: Watch things heat up in the kitchen as two local chefs go head-to-head to create a three-course meal utilizing ingredients sourced from one of the city’s unique marketplaces.

programme.desc: Dzhokhar Tsarnaev and his brother Tamerlan set two pressure cooker bombs at the finish line of the 2013 Boston Marathon. The explosion kills three and injures over 200 people.

programme.desc: Five-time Olympic track-and-field star, Marion Jones, tirelessly denies doping to achieve success. In the end, she pays the ultimate price. Plus, two Pennsylvania judges abuse their power to unjustly throw thousands of kids into juvenile detention centers in exchange for bribes.

programme.title: The Badboy Rockstar
programme.desc: AC/DC drummer Phil Rudd's temper leads to charges of threatening to kill and drug possession. Plus, as President of the Philippines, Ferdinand Marcos used his reign to launder billions of dollars of stolen public funds.

programme.title: Terror Attack At 30,000 Ft.
programme.desc: Pan Am Flight 103, from London to New York, blows up over Lockerbie, Scotland in a horrific attack. Plus, Lutfur Rahman is the first directly elected independent mayor of Tower Hamlets in London. However, multiple scandals plague his time in office.

programme.title: The Sydney Cafe Massacre
programme.desc: Haron Monis takes a Sydney cafe, and its patrons hostage for over two days on December 2014. Plus, 'Kid Cannabis' is a 19-year old pizza delivery boy by day and a multi-millionaire drug kingpin by night.

programme.title: The Good Wife Murder
programme.desc: Jane Bashara is found strangled to death in her car. Her husband of 26 years, Bob, is a suspect. Plus, self-proclaimed genius, Martin Frankel, becomes a multi-millionaire attributing his success to astrology chartsand breaking the law.

programme.title: The Long Island Lolita
programme.desc: Known as "The Long Island Lolita", teenager, Amy Fisher, shoots her 35-year-old lover's wife in the head, but she survives to tell the story. Plus, a reality television star with a larger-than-life personality finds herself living behind bars after pleading guilty to fraud.

programme.title: A Fashionista's Murder
programme.desc: Rudolph Moshammer, one of Germany's most successful fashion designers, is found murdered at the hands of a male prostitute. Plus, Christian rock star, Tim Lambesis, spirals out of control and gets caught up in a murder for hire plot.

programme.title: Free Spirit
programme.desc: Kate explores gin and rituals with a master distiller, talks art and cocktails with an Indigenous painter, and gets a lesson in moving mixology on George R.R. Martin’s adventure train in the high-desert city of Santa Fe.

programme.title: Survivor Stories: Life Beyond the Golden State Killer
programme.desc: Two Golden State Killer survivors help other sexual assault survivors heal.

programme.title: Absolutely Albuquerque
programme.desc: Amanda faces the heat while blowing glass, learns how to make one-of-a kind designer cookies and tries her hand at DJ 101 with slam poet Hakim Bellamy.

programme.title: Stitch
programme.desc: Incredible stories of tenacious trailblazers making their mark in sports

programme.title: News Fallback: Hour Long Docs
programme.desc: Long form storytelling from Very Local.

programme.title: Completed Episodes
programme.desc: From a para track and field star, to members of an elite octogenarian rowing team and a once-in-a-generation female quarterback, these groundbreaking athletes are 'Boston Strong.'

programme.title: Blind Kitchen
programme.desc: It’s a culinary battle of the senses between two iconic chefs in the City Beautiful. Watch as Chef Liz of Garp & Fuss in Winter Park takes on Chef Trina of Se7en Bites in The Milk District. It’s The Knife versus The Whisk!

programme.title: Eat Play Stay
programme.desc: Drink a local beer as you browse antiques and oddities. Donate to a good cause by sticking a dollar bill in the ceiling at a popular tavern, and get your recommended eight to fourteen hours of sleep in a vintage camper.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.desc: A teenager vanishes from her home one fall morning in 1999. Her body is discovered 17 days later, seven miles away. It takes more than 15 years for the heartbreaking truth to come out.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.desc: As Girl Scouts at Camp Scott settle into their tents one evening, eerie footsteps and distant cries haunt the campers throughout the night. The unsettling sounds turn out to be the echos one of the largest murder investigations in Oklahoma's history.

programme.title: Maker Nation Challenge
programme.desc: New Orleans is heads above the rest when it comes to parades and the art scene. Three local artists will be put to the test to design a New Orleans cocktail-inspired headpiece. But will a design twist prove that these creations can hold water?

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.desc: Chefs Jessica Peconi and Dee Dixon are getting saucy in today’s cooking challenge. Can the chefs craft the most savory dips, dressings, or relish? Or will they get Lost in the Sauce?

programme.title: Refugees Welcome: A Story of Immigration to America’s Heartland
programme.desc: Refugees Welcome documents how one Governor’s brave decision to welcome refugees during the Vietnam War had far reaching repercussions not only for the country but, generations later, for the fate of his own family.

programme.title: Chaos & Kindness
programme.desc: Justin tests his mettle to see if he can compete in the Ironman World Championship. With only seven months to train and no prior experience, can Justin pull off this amazing fitness feat?

programme.title: Show Me Milwaukee
programme.desc: Greg experiences Milwaukee through the eyes of former UFC World Champion Anthony Pettis from a martial arts masterclass to a not-to-be-missed Mexican eatery to an unforgettable MMA event.

programme.title: Eat Play Stay
programme.desc: Relive the '50s, sip smokin’ cocktails, and discover salty licorice fish in Amish country's hidden gem.

programme.title: Hit Me With Your Best Spot
programme.desc: These local experts are passionate about Orlando. The Magic’s DJ D-Strong shares his go-to cocktail spot. Lindsay from Lemonhearted dishes on her favorite destination for vegan treats. And, Equity Ben shows you where to cool off.

programme.title: Stitch
programme.desc: Parents wear many hats for their kids as caretakers, personal chauffeurs or chefs. But they’re also so much more – leaders, motivators and life savers. This episode showcases parents putting their heart on the line to help others.

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.desc: Sometimes the bad guys are busted by regular people! These stories showcase good Samaritans stopping suspects in their tracks.

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.desc: From a coffeeshop chain to snowy railroad tracks, these unconventional crime scenes bring the childhood game of Cops & Robbers to life.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.desc: A Missouri community seeks answers when two young women disappear a decade apart

programme.title: Chaos & Kindness
programme.desc: Join New Hampshire-based band Recycled Percussion as they perform acts of kindness in their community, and across the country. In each episode, you'll witness the great lengths and hilarious things they're willing to do in the name of kindness.

programme.title: In Transit by Esquire
programme.desc: Host Dave Holmes meets celebrity guests at the airport bar to discuss must-do activities in cities across America. So when you’re ready to board your next flight, you’ll have an Esquire-approved itinerary.

programme.title: What's On The Menu?
programme.desc: What's On The Menu?

programme.title: My Perfect Day
programme.desc: Karla, a devoted mother and doting grandmother has had her fair share of obstacles from two bouts of cancer to caring for her husband and daughter. Karla embarks on a much needed day of pampering, seeking solace and self-care.

programme.title: The Lost Children of Carlisle
programme.desc: A powerful look at the history of Native American boarding schools as told through the stories of tribal members and their surviving family members, who endured an educational system founded on the concept “Kill the Indian in him, and save the man.”

programme.title: News Fallback: Hour Long Docs
programme.desc: Long form storytelling from Very Local.

programme.title: Local Love
programme.desc: One local single experiences some of the best their city has to offer on three blind dates. Our singles may spend three perfect days out on the town, but there can only be one love match. Who will be picked for a second date?

programme.title: Sports Town Stories
programme.desc: Each episode of this documentary series features incredible sports stories from iconic American cities. From gritty underdog victories to passionate unlikely match-ups, the series proves that sports are so much more than a pastime.

programme.title: My Amazing Cheap Date
programme.desc: Host and comedic actor Amy Brassette McKeon challenges two sets of couples to pass a good time on a dime in their city. Find out which couple will experience the most amazing date for under fifty bucks.

programme.title: Wait, What Happened?
programme.desc: In this game show, comedian Frank Nicotero hits the streets to ask people questions inspired by the wildest news stories for a chance at winning a cash prize. These real-life stories with unreal outcomes will make you say, “Wait, What Happened?"

programme.title: Finding Adventure
programme.desc: Embark on amazing adventures across America with host Kinga Philipps who takes locals out of their comfort zones to experience transformation in the great outdoors.

programme.desc: What's On The Menu?

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.desc: A true crime series telling the story of unfathomable crimes that have rocked American communities leaving them forever changed.

programme.title: Ed & Day in The 'Burgh
programme.desc: Comedians, podcasters and craft beer enthusiasts Ed Bailey and Day Bracey explore hot spots, hidden gems and the best places to grab a cold brew in the 'Burgh.

programme.title: Blind Kitchen
programme.desc: Chefs recreate each other’s signature dish, but they can only determine what the dish is using their senses of taste, touch and smell. When the masks come off, the heat is on, with each chef attempting to cook their opponent’s creation.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.desc: Two serial killers whose chilling crimes left their communities devastated.

programme.title: Stitch

programme.desc: Watch things heat up in the kitchen as two local chefs go head-to-head to create a three-course meal utilizing ingredients sourced from one of the city’s unique marketplaces.
